title: MSI capsules
body: Hi, I just bought an MSI capsule but I cant open it, do I need a key or is it something else?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue, and if so are there any error messages?  I looked into this for you and don't see any MSI capsules on the account.  The last one used yielded skin shards for Hired Gun Graves, Queen Ashe, and TPA Orianna.  Nice!
Yea I just had to restard the client, btw i rerolled the skins and got mad scientist ziggs :D
